headline: Cascade® Launches "Clean Machine" Experiential Tour Inviting Consumers Inside the Dishwasher to See What "Clean" Really Means with Cascade Platinum Plus
summary: CINCINNATI, February 11, 2026--This weekend, Cascade®, America’s #1 recommended dishwasher detergent brand*, is taking consumers inside the dishwasher with its new Cascade Clean Machine debuting at the Florida State Fair. This experiential tour is a first-of-its-kind immersive experience to unshroud the mystery of what happens inside the dishwasher when Cascade Platinum Plus gets to work.

content.title: Cascade® Launches "Clean Machine" Experiential Tour Inviting Consumers Inside the Dishwasher to See What "Clean" Really Means with Cascade Platinum Plus

headline: Head & Shoulders Launches BARE Itchy Scalp Relief Serum to Prevent Recurring Itch and Flakes Between Washes
summary: CINCINNATI, February 11, 2026--Head & Shoulders, the world's #1 anti-dandruff shampoo, introduces Head & Shoulders BARE Itchy Scalp Relief Serum, a breakthrough scalp care solution designed to extend dandruff protection and itch relief beyond traditional wash days.
